answer:
We recommend that you contact your local health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse.  A public health nurse can review your travel plans and make a recommendation for your child.
You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## We recommend that you contact your local health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse.

A public health nurse can review your travel plans and make a recommendation for your child.
You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: How to book an early immunization that i can stary the 1st vaccine by one month after my baby was born instead of 2 month since I have a travel plan to China?
question_variation_0: how soon can you book an immunization that you can stary the vaccine if your baby was born
question_variation_1: how early can i get my 2nd vaccine in china
question_variation_2: how soon after baby born can i book early vaccine
